description:
For each window, some useful information is displayed: the title, the handle of window, location, size, class name, process number, the name of the program that created the window, and more...

In addition, you can easily hide, show, close or set to top-most mode the selected windows, or save the windows list to text or HTML file.
summary: Display the list of opened windows on your system
author: Nir Sofer
